path.style: stroke-width: 11px;stroke: #e0534e;stroke-linecap: round;fill: transparent;mix-blend-mode: darken;animation: rotate 2s infinite cubic-bezier(0.6, 0.03, 0.15, 1);transform-origin: 30px 30px;animation-delay: 0

stroke-width: 11px;stroke: #faec28;stroke-linecap: round;fill: transparent;mix-blend-mode: darken;animation: rotate 2s infinite cubic-bezier(0.6, 0.03, 0.15, 1);transform-origin: 30px 30px;animation-delay: 0.3s

stroke-width: 11px;stroke: #56aed2;stroke-linecap: round;fill: transparent;mix-blend-mode: darken;animation: rotate 2s infinite cubic-bezier(0.6, 0.03, 0.15, 1);transform-origin: 30px 30px;animation-delay: .15s
